title: ENERLITES Toggle Light Switch with Wall Plate, Single Pole, 15A 120-277V, Grounding Screw, Residential Grade, UL Listed, 88115-WWP-20PCS, White, 20 Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #20,683 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #152 in Electrical Light Switches       #152 in Electrical Light Switches

description: The ENERLITES 88115 15A toggle switch can replace any in-wall light switch of the same style. This listing is for a pack of 20 toggle light switches with wall plates bundle. This wall switch is made from high-quality Polycarbonate Thermoplastic (PCT) material for high resistance to heat and impacts. PCT is virtually indestructible, making it ideal for long-lasting applications. This makes the electrical switch ideal for both residential and commercial locations, such as houses, condos, schools, stores, restaurants, hotels, and more. Switches come in individually packaged boxes and are clearly marked with specifications and safety compliance. These 15 amp toggle switches are for single-pole use only and wiring instructions are included. This product is UL listed and includes a one-year warranty.
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Residential grade ON/OFF toggle light switch with shallow body design to fit standard junction boxes; push-in and side wiring (copper only); break-off plaster ears
Made with high-quality materials; impact-resistant Polycarbonate Thermoplastic with solid steel components; frame dimensions: 3.65” height x 0.88” width x 0.96” depth

Includes 20 Pack ENERLITES 8811-W Standard Size wall plates that Made of polycarbonate thermoplastic material to provide durability, flexibility, and resilience to withstand hard impacts and heavy force
Replaces any 1-gang wall switch; suitable for residential locations such as homes, apartments, condominiums, and for commercial use in corporate buildings, hotels, and restaurants

15A 120V-277V (AC); single pole; requires hot, load, & ground wires; option of back & side wiring (copper only); grounding screw; break-off plaster yoke tabs; wiring instructions included; UL-listed; 1-year warranty

customers_say: Customers find the light switch works well and appreciate its high quality and fast performance. They like its appearance, with one customer noting its nice color, and consider it affordable.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNice clean white switches and plates
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I like this pack of switches and wall plates. The plates and switches are super white which makes it a clean aesthetic. They work well. When you flip the switch it's quick and feels crisp. Installs like any other light switch.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsProduct is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These switches aren't much special but they do work as one would expect at a good price.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2025

customer_reviews.rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars4.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsEasy replacement for my old ivory light  switches
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Fast and easy replacement for my old ivory toggle light switches. The overall size of these the height, was a little bit smaller than my old ones. So they took a little more effort to get aligned properly with the electrical box and drywall.These are a little more recessed than my originals. I had to adjust the screws a little differently to make everything flush as well as the switch plates.Overall, they’re fine and they work and look great.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMuch better than Lowes!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Dark brown is the only thing readily available and black is heavily overpriced at our local box stores, left as a placeholder for anyone willing to pay a premium so when I saw this deal I jumped on it!These are such simple items, no need in paying double, if you don't have to.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: We are replacing all the light switches in our home with these. Affordable, fresh, and with fast shipping!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2024
